form.name: form1

span.span: At iSTEM we do school differently… iSTEM is a small, intellectually vibrant, Ohio public high school open to 9th through 12th graders. It is an early college program focused on problem-based learning with an emphasis on science, technology, engineering, and mathematics. We provide a personalized education designed to engage all students while creating connectivity to their future. iSTEM maximizes individual potential and ensures students are well-equipped to meet the challenges in the world around them.

span.div: A personalized education designed to engage all students while creating connectivity to their future.

td.span:
iSTEM Early College High School has a variety of partners who support us in a number of ways. At iSTEM our motto is "We Do School Differently." Among other things, this means that iSTEM students partner with organizations in ways that not only enhance and improve their own education, but allows them to work on real-world problems with our partners so that their work is meaningful and authentic.
Please visit the pages under the "Partner" tab to find out how you can help us prepare our students for 21st-century careers and help us fill the STEM workforce pipeline in northeast Ohio.

Your support will ensure that students at iSTEM will continue to receive a STEM-focused education along with a strong emphasis on Language Arts, Social Studies, and Art. They will have authentic experiences with subject matter experts and participate in a robust career exploration program. They will do so in a facility that supports the hands-on learning opportunities that prepare them for their future careers. Most importantly, your support means they will have the tools, knowledge, and experiences they need to excel in every stage of their lives.
We must be bold and actively promote STEM education, innovation, and achievement in the northeast Ohio. Please consider making a financial contribution to the campaign by using the online donation form below

div.span: Address: 8140 Auburn Road Concord Township, OH. 44077 | Phone: 440.358.8038
